A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Killed the franchise\, divided the fan base\, and killed my childhood hero Luke Skywalker and turned him into a character I couldn't recognize. Terrible story writing\, just look at the reviews!!! 44% rotten\, it's the worst rated Star Wars movie ever and that's a fact.  THIS is the movie that ruined Star Wars for a lot of fans including myself. If you think this is a decent movie then you've obviously never seen the original trilogy. Thanks Disney...
